name: aberdeen

a city in northeastern Scotland: I was working for an oil company in Aberdeen.
More examplesFewer examples Aberdeen has been the northern base for Britain's oil activities since the 70s.Last year house prices rose 20% in Glasgow, 16% in Dundee, 15% in Edinburgh and 10% in Aberdeen.700 miles is equivalent to the distance from Aberdeen to Penzance.Aberdeen businesses back the golf tournament.
